Package src.recomanador.domini

Class ControladorDominiAlgorisme

java.lang.Object
src.recomanador.domini.ControladorDominiAlgorisme
public class ControladorDominiAlgorisme extends Object
This class is used to call the algorithm and keep saved its parameters.

  • Field Details

    • inst

      private static ControladorDominiAlgorisme inst
      Contains the only instance of the class

    • ALGORISME_SELECCIONAT

      private int ALGORISME_SELECCIONAT
      Indicates which algorithm to use. Options are: 0 - collaborative filtering(Kmeans + Slope1) 1 - content-based filtering(KNN) 2 - hybrid approaches

    • K

      private int K
      Value used in the Kmeans algorithm. Determines how many centroids are used.

    • Q

      private int Q
      How many items to be recommended

    • colFilt

      CollaborativeFiltering colFilt
      instance of the Collaborative Filtering Algorithm

    • HybFilt

      HybridFiltering HybFilt
      instance of the Hybrid Filtering Algorithm

    • BasedFilt

      ContentBasedFiltering BasedFilt
      instance of the Content Based Filtering Algorithm

      public void set_k(int K) throws src.recomanador.excepcions.DataNotValidException
      Sets the attribute K of the active instance

    • set_Q

      public void set_Q(int Q) throws src.recomanador.excepcions.DataNotValidException
      Sets the attribute Q of the active instance
      Parameters:
      Q - an integer value representing how many items to be recommended
      Throws:
      src.recomanador.excepcions.DataNotValidException - Q has a invalid value

    • seleccionar_algorisme

      public void seleccionar_algorisme(int a) throws src.recomanador.excepcions.DataNotValidException
      Sets the attributre ALGORISME_SELECCIONAT of the active instance
      Parameters:
      a - an integer representing which recommendation algorithm should be ran. 0 represents collaborative filtering usking k-means+Slope-1, 1 represents content based filtering using k-Nearest-Neighbours and 2 represents hybrid approaches
      Throws:
      src.recomanador.excepcions.DataNotValidException - Algorithm has a invalid value

      Reset the 3 values of the controller

    • setData

      public void setData(ConjuntItems items, ConjuntUsuaris usuaris, ConjuntRecomanacions valoracions)
      Runs the selected recommendation algorithm.
      Parameters:
      items - ConjuntItems from which the ratings will be generated
      usuaris - ConjuntUsuaris which will help generate the ratings on Collaborative Filtering
      valoracions - ConjuntRecomanacions which contain the ratings from which we will base our new ratings.

    • run_algorithm

      public ArrayList<ItemValoracioEstimada> run_algorithm(int user_ID) throws src.recomanador.excepcions.UserNotFoundException
      Runs the selected recommendation algorithm, without updating the values.
      Parameters:
      user_ID - user whose recommendations will be generated
      Returns:
      A sorted ArrayList of Q ItemValoracioEstimada, containing the items to be recommended and their estimated ratings. How these are generated depends on the attributes Q, K and ALGORISME_SELECCIONAT of the active ControladorDominiAlgorisme instance.
      Throws:
      src.recomanador.excepcions.UserNotFoundException - if the id specified is not valid
